hero.title: Outsourced Accounting Made Simple
hero.description: Are you struggling to manage your back-office accounting functions? Do you need a fractional CFO to grow your business? Wolf & Company alleviates stress, saves time, and scales to meet your needs, on your terms – so you can grow with confidence.

testimonial.quote: Perfection isn't our goal—it's our starting point. Your books deserve more than just accuracy; they deserve the kind of thoughtful, detail-obsessed care that makes financial headaches disappear.
testimonial.conclusion: SO You can breathe a big sigh of relief. Your books are in good hands.

contactInvite.heading: If any of this sounds of interest to you, please do not hesitate to contact us.
contactInvite.description: Our initial consultations are free as we want to ensure that our firm is a good fit for all our clients.

columns.title: Set up + Clean Up
items: Review fastest ways to collect payment from customers (i.e. PayPal, Intuit Payments, Stripe)

columns.title: Bookkeeping
items: Split revenue and expenses by classes
Reviewing and maintaining the general ledger

columns.title: Fractional Controller
items: Simple financial reporting (income statement, balance sheet, statement of cash flows)

cta.heading: Ready to transform your accounting experience?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can help your business grow with confidence.
